籤詩版本二:
ʻO kahi hōʻike maikaʻi e kū ai ʻoe i waho o ka lehulehu me ka maka, a hoʻololi kou wā e hiki mai ana a lawe mai ʻoe i ka waiwai nui.
He ala ākea e like me ka lani, a ʻo nā kālā a pau āu e hāʻawi ai i loko o kou puʻuwai
詩意:
Hōʻike kēia hexagram i ka wā e hiki mai ana.
Holo maikaʻi nā mea a pau.
解曰:
He alanui nui. Hiki iā ʻoe ke neʻe i mua. E hoʻohana i kou puʻuwai. Imua wale no.
Hele nā ​​mea a pau e like me ka hoʻolālā me kēia hōʻailona. Laki maikaʻi iā Jichang.
籤詩故事一:
◇ ʻEkolu mau koa e hakakā me Lu Bu
Pane: ʻEkolu mau koa Zhang Fei, Guan Yu, a me Liu Bei e hakakā me Lu Bu
Ua ʻike ʻo Dong Zhuo ua ʻoki ʻia ke poʻo ʻo Hua Xiong a ua hoʻouna ʻia ʻo Lu Bu e lele e kaua. I ka wā i hele ai ʻo Lu Bu i ke kaua, ua pepehi ʻo ia i nā pūkaua ʻo Fang Yue a me Mu Shun, a pepehi iā Wu Anguo a me Gongsun Zan.
Ua ʻike ʻo Zhang Fei ʻaʻole hiki iā Gongsun Zan ke lanakila iā Lu Bu, no laila ua hoʻololi koke ʻo ia iā Gongsun Zan a hoʻōho: "E haʻalele nā ​​kauā o nā inoa inoa ʻekolu! Aia ʻo Zhang Fei mai Yan!" Ma hope o kēlā, ua hakakā lākou no nā pōʻai he kanalima. me ka lanakila ole.
Ma hope o ka ʻike ʻana o Guan Yu, ua hoʻouka ʻo ia me Zhang Fei iā Lu Bu a hakakā ʻo ia no kanakolu puni.
Ua lawe pū ʻo Liu Bei i nā pahi kaua ʻelua, paʻi i kona lio a hele i mua e kōkua iā Zhang Fei lāua ʻo Guan Yu.
Hoʻopuni nā kānaka ʻekolu iā Lu Bu a hoʻomau i ka hakakā ʻana, ʻo ka poʻe a pau o ka pūʻulu puʻuwai.
ʻAʻole i liʻuliʻu, ua hoʻomaka ʻo Lu Bu i ka emi ʻana o ka ikaika, ua emi hope ka Pegasus o Lu Bu, akā ua alualu nā kānaka ʻekolu iā Lu Bu me ka hōʻole ʻole e haʻalele, ʻaʻole lākou i haʻalele a hiki i ko lākou hālāwai ʻana me ko Lu Bu pūʻali.
"ʻEkolu Aupuni"
(He ʻano hoʻohālikelike kēia moʻolelo no ke koa a me ke akamai o Lu Bu i ka hakakā. Hiki i ke kanaka ke lanakila i ʻekolu kānaka.)
聖意: ʻO ka puʻuwai o ka hale a me ka home e hele wale ana ma kāna huakaʻi ponoʻī e ʻimi i ka waiwai. ʻO kahi ʻatikala male hiki ke hele i Liujia. Hele maikaʻi nā mea no nā kānaka. Hoʻohana ʻia nā enuhe silika Zhushuntian. Hiki ke loaʻa nā kānaka i waena o nā holoholona ʻeono. Ma mua o ka hoʻopiʻi lehulehu, Yichang , migration, lilo waiwai, mai, mauna luakupapau, etc., he pomaikai.
古人: ʻEkolu mau koa e hakakā me Lu Bu
